content: सिंधुः [स्यंद्-उद् संप्रसारणं दस्य धश्च <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The sea, ocean. {@--2@} The Indus. {@--3@} The country around the Indus. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river in Mālvā; <ls>Me. 29</ls> (where <ls>Malli.</ls>'s remark सिंधुर्नाम नदी तु कुत्रापि नास्ति is gratuitous); <ls>Māl. 4. 9</ls> (see Dr. Bhāndārkar's note {%ad loc.%}). {@--5@} The water ejected from an elephant's trunk. {@--6@} The juice exuding from the temples of an elephant. {@--7@} An elephant. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa. {@--9@} White borax. {@--10@} A kind of musical mode (राग). --<ab>pl.</ab> The inhabitants of the {%Sindhu%} country. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A great river or river in general; पिबत्यसौ पाययते च सिंधूः <ls>R. 13. 9</ls>; <ls>Me. 46</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 21</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 6</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">5. 85.</ls> {@--2@} The river Sindhu.
